heavy one today we are making crispy
noodle stir-fry or miss out yo let's
begin firstly soak the dried shitake
mushrooms in hot water to soften you can
also use other kinds of mushrooms that
you like here I also use some straw
mushrooms or number of trim the ends and
cut the straw mushrooms in half for
vegetables you're going to need 1 P
onion 1 carrot 1 red puppy car or bell
pepper a small head of broccoli
separated into small florets some baby
cones and snow peas for the snow peas
cut the tips and pull out the strings
that run along the size we also need
some pop toys and coriander cut the red
bell pepper into about 1 inch square
pieces
cut the onion into large wedges and cut
it wedge into half then separate the
onion layers make v-shaped shallow
incisions around the carrots and then
slide into flowers for the beef cut into
very thin slices you can use the loin or
eye of round instead of beef you can
also use a variety of seafood like
streams squids as muscles etc you can
also use fried tofu pops4 vegetarian
version seasoned with two tablespoons of
minced garlic a teaspoon of minced
ginger a teaspoon of salt a teaspoon of
chicken stock a tablespoon of vegetable
oil and mix well don't forget to add
some pepper and also a tablespoon of
cornstarch or tapioca starch the starch
and the vegetable oil will form a thin
layer outside the beef slice keeping
other juices inside when we stir fry cut
the silicon mushrooms in half
cut the BOK Choy's in quarters now
prepare an ice bath bring a saucepan of
water to a boil and then add a teaspoon
of salt blanch the snow peas for about
two minutes then transfer them to the I
water bottle spoon the iced water helps
to keep the green color of the snow peas
also quickly blanch the carrots for
about 30 seconds these two vegetables
take more time to cook so we blanch them
first so that the cooking time for all
the vegetables are almost about the same
heat a generous amount of vegetable oil
in a pan using the yellow noodle bundle
and got into the hot water then flip it
over and fry the other side the noodle
will increase in volume and look like a
bird nest then remove and place on paper
towel to drain off the excess oil if you
can buy fresh egg noodles you can also
separate them into a plate and push into
the hot oil if you use dried egg noodles
cook them one minute shorter than tacit
instructions then drain well and we fry
in the same way
to make the stir-fry sauce mix four
tablespoons of soy sauce with four
tablespoons of oyster sauce also I have
two tablespoons of sesame oil and two
teaspoons of sugar mix well and set
aside ideally you would use a large wok
and stir-fry one serving at a time fry
some minced garlic until fragrant add
the beef and the frontier is no longer
pink then transfer to a bowl then add
some oil in the pan and to fry the
mushrooms
then add the baby comes and stir fry for
minutes then add the bell peppers
broccoli and the rest of the vegetables
also add the sauce and quickly stir fry
on high heat until the vegetables are
cooked through but still maintain the
crunch finally add the onion and the bok
choy oh God our crowding the pan is

adding the beef and could lay stir-fry
for about a minute or so and then turn
